subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Bruce Halliday makes his claim
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Hi Mike

Sighhhhh normally I wouldnt reply to BS but it seems I always end up having to comment on his conflicts with members of this group.

No.. I wont remove it. It's been sent out to everyone long before I got home from work so removing it would be pointless. You are all adults. You are correct and the posts on this forum support the fact that you were the first one to post the idea to hack the 12-470 and others were just following your theoretical idea. Anyone can do a simple search for 12-470 and find the truth for themselves. I find it very sad that someone who is a great researcher can develop such personality conflicts that they feel the need to attack other members in the community rather than work with them to move forward and learn more together. That goes for all members who get involved in these war of words.

Just to clear things up so there are no misconceptions... For the record Bruce was NEVER banned here by me or anyone else. Some felt he may have deserved it a few times, but he chose to leave on his own accord. That was his choice not mine. 

I know alot of people including Bruce now think I personally dislike him but in fact thats not true. I just wish people would learn from their mistakes. I find him to be a great asset to the research when hes thinking clearly and acting in a positive manner.

He left this group twice after causing some blowups and members were emailing me his personal attacks that were sent via email and asking me to ban him but some were just as guilty. When he decided to make his comeback the third time I denied him. That was my choice, I didnt ask anyones permission for the decision I made. From what I understand he continues to do that on the other groups he is in. Again it is very sad for me. I tried to help him when he first got started and I enjoyed watching the progress he made.

Ego is a nasty double edged sword. 

Bruce, I know you read this (our group is publically available to the world) and I would just like to say that I dont hate you tho the feeling may not be mutual. I dont wish bad things to happen to you and I hope that people learn to accept the fact they are not an expert, never will be an expert, but thats ok because NO ONE is including me! And let the ego go man. Your work will speak for itself and the nastiness gets in the way of progress. I enjoyed working WITH you. And I am sure others do too. 

I like both sides of the conflict (as usual) so all I can say is there are better things to do with your time than fight with each other people!

Love and Light!

Misty
